title: Scout can create and save a player profile
custom_preconds: Log in to app as a domestic scout
custom_steps:
1) Click “Create” in the navigation panel
2) Click “Amateur Player”
3) Fill in all fields and click “Create”
4) Fill in required fields and click “Save”
custom_expected:
1) The create new menu displays
2) Create Player fields display (First Name, Last Name, School, Date of Birth)
3) Amateur Player screen displays
4) The amateur player appears on the Amateur Player clipboard with a status of “Preliminary”

*Player must 14 years of age or older*

title: Scout can create and submit a player profile to clipboard
custom_preconds: Log in to app as a domestic scout
custom_steps:
1) Click “Create” in the navigation panel
2) Click “Amateur Player”
3) Fill in all fields and click “Create”
4) Fill in required fields and click “Submit”
custom_expected:
1) The create new menu displays
2) Create Player fields display (First Name, Last Name, School, Date of Birth)
3) Amateur Player screen displays
4) The amateur player appears on the Amateur Player clipboard with a status of “Ready”

title: Scout can delete preliminary player from clipboard
custom_preconds: Log in to app as a domestic scout and locate Amateur Player Clipboard
custom_steps:
1) Click check circle next to player that has a status of Preliminary 
2) Click “Delete”
3) Click “Delete” to verify
custom_expected:
1) Check circle is now highlighted in blue
2) Verification message appears
3) The profile is removed from the Scout Clipboard

Scout can also delete a preliminary player from the clipboard by swiping left over the player’s horizontal column and clicking the red delete button. Verify this function works as well.

title: Scout can make updates to an approved player profile
custom_preconds: Log in to app as a domestic scout
custom_steps:
1) Click “Search” in the navigation panel
2) Enter Last Name of player in text box and click search
3) Choose player from Search Results list
4) Click “Edit”
5) Make a change for at least one field, click “Save”
6) Click “Submit”
custom_expected:
1) The search screen displays
2) Player will appear in search results
3) Player profile appears in view mode
4) Profile reappears in edit mode
5) Profile returns to view mode
6) The amateur player update appears on the Amateur Player clipboard with a status of “Ready”

The update made to the player profile will be sent to admin for review after a user sync.

title: Scout can edit contact information in player profile
custom_preconds: Log in to app as a domestic scout
custom_steps:
1) Open a player profile
2) Click “Edit”
3) Click “Add” next to the following fields: Personal Address(es), Phone(s), and Personal E-mail(s).
4) Fill out info for each and click “Save”
custom_expected:
1) Player profile appears in view mode
2) Profile re-appears in edit mode
3) A new screen will appear for each field
4) User is brought back to profile page

title: System shows matching message for existing player
custom_preconds: Log in to app as a domestic scout and note an existing player's First Name, Last Name, DOB, School
custom_steps:
1) Click “Create” in the navigation panel
2) Click “Amateur Player”
3) Fill in all fields with same info as existing player and click “Create”
custom_expected:
1) The create new menu displays
2) Create Player fields display (First Name, Last Name, School, Date of Birth)
3) Matching screen displays with list of potential matches

title: Scout can click on matching player to view profile
custom_steps:
1. Click matching profile link
2. Click Save
custom_expected:
1. Matching profile opens in edit mode with info filled in 
2. Profile saves and reloads in view mode

title: Scout can export player profile and other items to Excel/PDF
custom_preconds: Log in to app as a domestic scout
custom_steps:
1) Open player profile via clipboard or search
2) Click “Export”
3) Click “Excel”
4) Click “PDF”
custom_expected:
1) Player profile opens in view mode
2) Dropdown menu displays options “Excel” and “PDF”
3) Window appears with Mail icon and others depending on iPad
4) Window appears with Mail icon and others depending on iPad

Repeat steps with an amateur player report and a school profile

title: Scout cannot sync player until school is synced
custom_preconds: Log in to app as a domestic scout
custom_steps:
1) Click “Create” in the navigation panel
2) Click “Amateur Player”
3) Fill in all fields while using a school from the clipboard that is not yet synced -> Click “Create”
4) Fill in required fields and click “Submit”
custom_expected:
1) The create new menu displays
2) Create Player fields display (First Name, Last Name, School, Date of Birth)
3) Amateur Player screen displays
4) The user receives an error message

title: Scout cannot create a profile that contains a school that is not in system
custom_preconds: Log in to app as a domestic scout
custom_steps:
1) Click “Create” in the navigation panel
2) Click “Amateur Player”
3) Fill in all fields while using a school that is not in the system and click “Create”
custom_expected:
1) The create new menu displays
2) Create Player fields display (First Name, Last Name, School, Date of Birth)
3) Message appears that reads “Please select a school”

title: Scout can save a preliminary report for a preliminary player
custom_preconds:
Log in to app as a domestic scout

Create player with a status of "Preliminary"
custom_steps:
1) Click “Create” in the navigation panel
2) Click “Amateur Player Report”
3) Enter first three letters of a preliminary player’s last name to generate dropdown list
4) Select player, edit other fields if necessary, and click “Create”
5) Input at least one field and click “Save”
custom_expected:
1) The create new menu displays
2) Create Player Report fields display (Name, Report Date, Report Type)
3) Dropdown list with matches will display
4) Amateur Player Report screen displays
5) The report appears on the Amateur Player Report clipboard with a status of “Preliminary”

title: Scout can create and submit report for position player to clipboard
custom_preconds: Log in to app as a domestic scout
custom_steps:
1) Click “Create” in the navigation panel
2) Click “Amateur Player Report”
3) Enter first three letters of a position player’s last name to generate dropdown list (player status must be ready or submitted)
4) Select player, (choose "Prospect" in report type field) and click “Create”
5) Input required fields and click “Submit”
custom_expected:
1) The create new menu displays
2) Create Player Report fields display (Name, Report Date, Report Type)
3) Dropdown list with matches will display
4) Amateur Player Report screen displays (For a position player, this screen should show “Player Evaluation” section with “Hitting Style” and “Mechanics” fields required. It should also show “Position Player Info” section with required fields)
5) The report appears on the Amateur Player Report clipboard with a status of “Ready”

title: Prospect Report - Future value must be greater than or equal to present value
custom_preconds: Log in to app as a domestic scout
custom_steps:
1) Click “Create” in the navigation panel
2) Click “Amateur Player Report”
3) Enter first three letters of a position player’s last name to generate dropdown list (player status must be ready or submitted)
4) Select player, choose “Prospect” as Report Type, and click “Create”
5) Input required fields while entering a present value that is greater than a future value and click “Submit”
custom_expected:
1) The create new menu displays
2) Create Player Report fields display (Name, Report Date, Report Type)
3) Dropdown list with matches will display
4) Amateur Player Report screen displays (For a position player, this screen should show “Player Evaluation” section with “Hitting Style” and “Mechanics” fields required. It should also show “Position Player Info” section with required fields)
5) Message appears that future value must be greater than or equal to present value

Repeat steps with an amateur player report for a pitcher

title: Scout can create and submit report for pitcher to clipboard
custom_preconds: Log in to app as a domestic scout
custom_steps:
1) Click “Create” in the navigation panel
2) Click “Amateur Player Report”
3) Enter first three letters of a pitcher’s last name to generate dropdown list (player status must be ready or submitted)
4) Select player, (choose "Prospect" in report type field) and click “Create”
5) Input required fields and click “Submit”
custom_expected:
1) The create new menu displays
2) Create Player Report fields display (Name, Report Date, Report Type)
3) Dropdown list with matches will display
4) Amateur Player Report screen displays (For a pitcher, this screen should show “Player Evaluation” section with the following required fields: Arm Action, Arm Angle, Delivery, Windup, Mechanics. It should also show “Pitcher Player Info” section with required fields.
5) The report appears on the Amateur Player Report clipboard with a status of “Ready”

title: Scout cannot sync a player report until player profile is synced
custom_preconds: Log in to app as a domestic scout
custom_steps:
1) Click “Create” in the navigation panel
2) Click “Amateur Player Report”
3) Enter a non synced player from the clipboard by typing in the player's first three letters of his last name to generate dropdown list
4) Select player, edit other fields if necessary, and click “Create”
5) Input required fields and click “Submit,” followed by “Sync”
custom_expected:
1) The create new menu displays
2) Create Player Report fields display (Name, Report Date, Report Type)
3) Dropdown list with matches will display
4) Amateur Player Report screen displays
5) The user receives an error message stating that the player must be synced before syncing the report

title: Scout can create and submit a change report
custom_preconds: Log in to app as a domestic scout
custom_steps:
1) Click “Create” in the navigation panel
2) Click “Amateur Player Report”
3) Enter first three letters of a player’s last name to generate dropdown list (player status must be ready or submitted)
4) Edit report type to "Change"
5) Click “Create”
6) Input required fields and click “Submit”
custom_expected:
1) The create new menu displays
2) Create Player Report fields display (Name, Report Date, Report Type)
3) Dropdown list with matches will display
4) Report Type field now shows "Change"
5) Amateur Player Report screen displays
6) The report appears on the Amateur Player Report clipboard with a status of “Ready”

title: OFP adjusted cannot be more than 10 pts from OFP basic
custom_preconds: Log in to app as a domestic scout
custom_steps:
1) Click “Create” in the navigation panel
2) Click “Amateur Player Report”
3) Enter first three letters of a position player’s last name to generate dropdown list (player status must be submitted)
4) Select player, edit other fields if necessary, and click “Create”
5) Input required fields. In the “Position Player Info” section, enter an “OFP Adjusted” that is more than 10 points greater than OFP Basic. 
6) Click “Submit”
custom_expected:
1) The create new menu displays
2) Create Player Report fields display (Name, Report Date, Report Type)
3) Dropdown list with matches will display
4) Amateur Player Report screen displays 
5) -
6) A message appears stating that adjusted OFP can only differ from basic OFP by 10 or less points

title: Maximum velocity must be greater than or equal to minimum velocity
custom_preconds: Log in to app as a domestic scout
custom_steps:
1) Click “Create” in the navigation panel
2) Click “Amateur Player Report”
3) Enter first three letters of a pitcher’s last name to generate dropdown list (player status must be submitted)
4) Select player, edit other fields if necessary, and click “Create”
5) Input required fields. In the “Pitcher Player Info” section, enter a “Min Velocity” that is greater than the “Max Velocity” for a fastball.
6) Click “Submit"
custom_expected:
1) The create new menu displays
2) Create Player Report fields display (Name, Report Date, Report Type)
3) Dropdown list with matches will display
4) Amateur Player Report screen displays 
5) -
6) A message appears stating that maximum velocity must be greater than or equal to minimum velocity

custom_steps:
1) Click “Create” in the navigation panel
2) Click “School”
3) Fill in all fields and click “Create”
4) Fill in required fields and click “Submit”
custom_expected:
1) The create new menu displays
2) Create School fields display (School Name, School Type, Country, City, State)
3) Amateur Player screen displays
4) The school appears on the School clipboard with a status of “Ready”

title: System finds a possible match to an existing school
custom_preconds: Log in to app as a domestic scout and note a school’s Name, Type, Country, City, and State
custom_steps:
1) Click “Create” in the navigation panel
2) Click “School”
3) Fill in all fields with same info as existing school and click “Create”
custom_expected:
1) The create new menu displays
2) Create School fields display (School Name, School Type, Country, City, State)
3) Matching screen displays with list of potential matches

title: Scout can perform search for amateur players
custom_preconds: Log in to app as a domestic scout
custom_steps:
1) Click “Search” in the navigation panel
2) Click “Search – Amateur Players” at the top of the screen
3) On main search screen, filter search (i.e. Last Name and type) and enter value in field
4) Click “Search”
custom_expected:
1) The search screen displays
2) Dropdown menu displays Amateur Player, School, and Amateur Player Report
3) The user is able to filter search and type into textbox
4) Player(s) that matches search appears in "Search Results"

title: Scout can perform search for amateur reports
custom_preconds: Log in to app as a domestic scout
custom_steps:
1) Click “Search” in the navigation panel
2) Click “Search – Amateur Player Report” at the top of the screen
3) On main search screen, filter search (i.e. Last Name and type) and enter value in field
4) Click “Search”
custom_expected:
1) The search screen displays
2) Dropdown menu displays Amateur Player, School, and Amateur Player Report
3) The user is able to filter search and type into textbox
4) Player Report(s) that matches search appears in "Search Results"

title: Scout can perform search for schools
custom_preconds: Log in to app as a domestic scout

2) Click “Search – School” at the top of the screen
3) On main search screen, filter search (i.e. School Name and type) and enter value in field
4) Click “Search”
custom_expected:
1) The search screen displays
2) Dropdown menu displays Amateur Player, School, and Amateur Player Report
3) The user is able to filter search and type into textbox
4) School(s) that matches search appears in "Search Results"

title: Scout can sync Player(s) via clipboard
custom_preconds:
Make sure iPad is connected to WiFi or 3G

Login in to app as domestic scout

Create an Amateur Player with a status of 'Ready'
custom_steps:
1) Click check circle next to the amateur player created 
2) Click “Sync”
3) Login online as a scout at https://ebisdev.mlb.com/
4) Login online as an admin
custom_expected:
1) Check circle is now highlighted in blue
2) Amateur Player successfully syncs and appears on clipboard with a status of “Submitted”
3) Item appears on the scout clipboard with a status of “Submitted”
4) Scout created item appears on the admin clipboard with a status of "Submitted"

title: Scout can sync Amateur Player Report(s) via clipboard
custom_preconds:
Make sure iPad is connected to WiFi or 3G

Login in to app as domestic scout

Create an Amateur Player Report with a status of 'Ready'
custom_steps:
1) Click check circle next to the amateur player report created 
2) Click “Sync”
3) Login online as a scout at https://ebisdev.mlb.com/
4) Login online as an admin
custom_expected:

2) Amateur Player Report successfully syncs and appears on clipboard with a status of “Submitted”
3) Item appears on the scout clipboard with a status of “Submitted”
4) Scout created item appears on the admin clipboard with a status of "Submitted"

title: Scout can sync multiple different items from clipboard (s)
custom_preconds:
Login as Scout

Have items on each clipboards (Amateur Player, School, and Amateur Player Report)
custom_steps:
1. Locate items on all three clipboards
2. Select a few items from each by clicking circles to the right of the items
3. Click 'Sync'
custom_expected:
1. Items are displayed on the clipboards
2. Circles are now highlighted in blue next to different items
3. All multiple items from different clipboards are synced at the same time

title: Scout can sync Amateur Player via profile
custom_preconds:
Make sure iPad is connected to WiFi or 3G

Login in to app as domestic scout

Create and submit an Amateur Player so it is displayed on clipboard
custom_steps:
1) Open amateur player profile by clicking on a desired player in the clipboard
2) Click “Sync”
3) Login online as a scout at https://ebisdev.mlb.com/
4) Login online as an admin
custom_expected:
1) Player profile appears in view mode
2) Amateur Player successfully syncs and appears on clipboard with a status of “Submitted”
3) Item appears on the scout clipboard with a status of “Submitted”
4) Scout created item appears on the admin clipboard with a status of "Submitted"

title: Admin can approve synced items
custom_preconds: Amateur Player, Amateur Player Report and School must be synced
custom_steps:
1) Login online as a admin at https://ebisdev.mlb.com/
2) Locate Scouting Admin Clipboard and locate the three created items on clipboard (Amateur Player, Amateur Player Report, School)
3) Check off the checkbox for each item (3 total)
4) Click “Approve”
5) Click “Yes”
6) Login to the app and click yes to sync from server
custom_expected:
1) Homepage loads and widgets appear
2) Items appear in the widget
3) Checkboxes are marked off via green checkmark
4) Approve message appears asking if the user is sure they would like to approve
5) Items are approved and approval success message appears
6) Items should be removed from the clipboards

Open profiles via advanced search and verify that each has a status of “Approved”

title: Admin can reject synced items
custom_preconds: Amateur Player, Amateur Player Report and School must be synced
custom_steps:
1) Login online as a admin at https://ebisdev.mlb.com/
2) Locate Scouting Admin Clipboard and locate the three created items (Amateur Player, Amateur Player Report, School)
3) Check off the checkbox for each item (3 total)
4) Click “Reject”
5) Click “Yes”
6) Login to app as creating scout and locate rejected items
custom_expected:
1) Homepage loads and widgets appear
2) Items appear in the widget
3) Checkboxes are marked off via green checkmark
4) Reject message appears asking if the user is sure they would like to reject
5) Items are rejected and rejection success message appears
6) Items should be present with a status of "Rejected" but they should not be editable

Open profiles via advanced search and verify that each has a status of “Rejected”

title: Scout/Admin cannot sync while not connected to 3G or WiFi
custom_preconds: iPad is not connected to WiFi or 3G
custom_steps:
1) Login as domestic scout
2) Click “Yes”
3) Select 2-3 players with a status of “Ready” and click “Sync”
custom_expected:
1) Message appears: “You are not connected to the internet. Would you like to continue in offline mode?”
2) User is logged in offline
3) Message appears: “You are currently offline. Please log out and log back in when you are connected to the Internet.”

title: Losing and regaining connection
custom_steps:
1) Go to a place with unreliable WiFi (ex. Starbucks)
2) Sync a mix of items on offline app
3) Try to lose connection
4) Once connection is regained, sync items
custom_expected:
1) Connect to WiFi and login to app
2) Items should sync at the same rate they would in the office
3) Internet connection is lost
4) Items should sync without having to log off and log back on to the app. Message shows which items were synced successfully and which were not (if any).

Some items will be synced successfully before connection is lost and have a status of “Submitted”

title: Losing connection while signing on
custom_preconds: Must be connected to the internet and in an area where internet connection is easily lost
custom_steps:
1) Log into app as a domestic scout while having somewhat of an Internet connection
2) Lose the Internet connection as you're logging in
custom_expected:
1) App attempts to log user on
2) Message appears: "You are not connect to the Internet. would you like to continue in offline mode"

title: Unreliable connection
custom_preconds: Must be connected to an open source WiFi (ex. HomeRun at MLBAM)
custom_steps:
1) Login to the WiFi under the settings button on iPad (For MLBAM use, "HomeRun"- Guest/Guest)
2) Log into the app as a domestic scout
3) Create and sync items
4) Lose Internet connection from server (For MLBAM, HomeRun)
custom_expected:
1) Logged onto WiFi
2) App opens
3) Items are created and attempted to sync
4) Connection is lost, in order to gain connection again, user must open up WiFi settings and retype in username and password

Username and Password window to reconnect does not show up on app
